name: HOST (itch) (VeryCleverName3)
description:
HOST is a game where you play as a parasite who must switch to a new HOST every few seconds, or else you will be forced "out of control", represented by the bar underneath your player.

Controls:

WASD to move, mouse to aim, click to use ability.

There are three types of enemies, each with a different ability and movement pattern.

Music: Erdfall by Kraftamt
